name: Fast Enemy
description: High-speed enemy with increased coin value.

context_fields.when_to_use: Fast enemies move quickly and provide higher coin rewards
context_fields.priority_level: Medium - faster movement requires quicker response
synergy_combinations: High attack speed for consistent hits
Range bonuses to catch fast-moving targets
Area-of-effect abilities for multiple fast enemies
counter_strategies: Requires faster response due to high speed
Higher coin value makes them priority targets
Can overwhelm if not dealt with quickly
context_fields.resource_efficiency: High - fast enemies provide double coin income

strategy.description: Fast enemies move at double speed and provide double coin rewards
tips: Require faster response due to high movement speed
Higher coin value makes them priority targets
Can overwhelm defenses if not dealt with quickly
